Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item; it's a solution designed to enhance your daily life. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it for $120. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations and bring you immense satisfaction. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this offer further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
